channel.title: REP Awareness Month
channel.description:
It's a serious problem growing in the moparscape community, REP.
It causes many people to type like retards, and worst of all, spend more time on the computer.
For now on I think December should be REP Awareness month due to the holidays.
Please support this growing problem, end moparscape before it takes over MitB.

item.title: REP Awareness Month
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“ZeroFreeze, post:35, topic:161075”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=219155.msg1906407#msg1906407 date=1196427915]
People who have more posts on Moparscape cannot go to this site.
People who have more posts on Moparisthebest cannot go to Moparisthebest.
If a Moparscaper likes Moparisthebest get some way to approve users.
If a Moparisthebester comes to Moparscape alot such as Silabsoft get a way to approve users as well.
Add a suggestion forum on Moparscape and it’s all fixed.

Difficult but ok.

No need for all the anti-moparscape suggestions in here.
Every suggestion here about Moparscape would fail, 99% of the members who are replying hate moparscape.
[/quote]
Yeah, but some of them have a good reason to do so.

Second sentence doesn’t make sense, btw.[/quote]
I mean like, posting suggestions/complaints or whatever about Moparscape.org on this site will turn into a failure off topic.
The only things you will get is ‘Delete moparscape’, ‘Gtfo moparscaper’, ‘Hes a moparscaper so let him die’ and replies like frank_
Some have a good reason to go to Moparscape or Moparisthebest, thats why we should maybe get some approve system or something and people like Budda don’t get approved to go to Moparscape since they only come there to spam and when they’re unmuted directly start again.

frank_:

he cant help it, he is a moparscaper

Your the example of people who shouldn’t be allowed to go there.

Read full topic
